This is the homepage for MATH 4720 (MSSC 5720) - Statistical Methods by [Dr. Mehdi Maadooliat](www.mssc.mu.edu/~mehdi) in Spring 2025 at Marquette University. All course materials will be posted on this site.

You can find the course syllabus [here](/course-syllabus.html) and the course schedule [here](/).
